sqlMap.select: select as_dataauth.iid,as_dataauth.ifuncregedit,as_dataauth.irole,as_dataauth.cdatavalue,as_funcregedit.ccode,as_funcregedit.cname, substring(as_dataauth.cdatavalue,1,1) as bdataauth1,substring(as_dataauth.cdatavalue,2,1) as ifind,substring(as_dataauth.cdatavalue,3,1) as iedit, substring(as_dataauth.cdatavalue,4,1) as idelete,substring(as_dataauth.cdatavalue,5,1) as bdataauth2,substring(as_dataauth.cdatavalue,6,1) as ilink from (select * from as_funcregedit where bdataauth1=1 or bdataauth2=1) as as_funcregedit left join as_dataauth on as_dataauth.ifuncregedit=as_funcregedit.iid $condition$ order by ccode
